document: <sentence id="s1" text="Growth abnormalities, motor dysfunction, hindlimb paralysis, muscle wasting, neurogenic atrophy, motor neuron degeneration, and loss of large-caliber axons in peripheral nerves occurred at an earlier age in li>cytoskeleton organization/Scyl3 double-deficient apoptotic process than in li>cytoskeleton organization-deficient apoptotic process.">
